### Internal Hackathon ‚Äî Universidad de Deusto  
**Result:** 3rd Place  
**Project:** [Snake with Curriculum Learning](https://github.com/emanueleiacca/Snake-with-Curriculum-Learning)  
**Summary:** Trained a **SnakeEnv agent** using **Stable Baselines3** and **curriculum learning**:  
- Started on small grids, scaling up to larger boards (up to 20x20)  
- Removed rendering for faster training (~1h30 runtime)  
- Best score: **18 apples eaten** across 100 iterations
